name: Meerkat Rush
description:
Help the meerkat crew escape the zoo! Be quick and jump, dig and stack to overcome various obstacles on your way to freedom. Useful power-ups will aid you on your run as well! But be careful: make sure to keep a safe distance from the angry zookeeper, you don't wanna mess with that guy! Collect coins along the way and beat the hightscore!
Meerkat Rush is a classic Jump´n´Run with cute design and lots of fun features to enjoy!

*********

FEATURES
★ Increasing difficulty from easy to challenging
★ Useful power-ups to maximize the fun experience
★ Upgrades to improve your power-ups
★ Diverse moveset to overcome various obstacles
★ InApp Shop
★ Online Highscore
★ 4 different sceneries
★ Cute and minimalist designs

If you have any feedback or encounter any problems please don't hesitate to contact us:
ch-corporation@hotmail.com

In order to download the game to your Android phone please sign in as a beta tester in the Google Play Store: https://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.chc.meerk...

Once you do that you will be able to find the game in the regular Play Store.

An iOS Version is coming soon!
